data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ament, Danilo César (2014): Taxonomic revision of the genus Chaetocnemistoptera Borgmeier (Diptera: Phoridae), with the description of five new species. Zootaxa 3753 (4): 301-322, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3753.4.1
